resources.string: Set the room history retention (in days)

plurals.name: tchap_room_creation_retention
plurals.item: The room history is limited to %d day
The room history is limited to %d days

resources.string: It must not contain any sensitive data.
Failed to save picture.\n Do you want to retry?
Encrypted and accessible only to agent users by invitation from an administrator.
Encrypted and accessible to all agent users and to external guests by invitation of an administrator.
Unencrypted and accessible automatically and only to all agent users from the forum directory (or a shared link).
You don\'t have a direct chat with %s, do you want to send him an invitation?
Are you sure you want to leave the room?\n\nThe room will no longer be administered, and you may not be able to join it again
You have already sent an invitation to %s
This contact already uses Tchap, you can send him a message now.
%s already uses Tchap, a discussion has been created with this contact
%s cannot be reached for the moment by Tchap
The externals are not allowed to join this room
Only the members of the domain \"%s\" are allowed
Unable to send invite: Network error
You will receive a notification when \n your guest joins the Tchap community
This app is not approved for\nrestricted information interchange
An error occurred, please try later
The remote user left definitely this room
You are not allowed to join this conversation. An invitation is needed.
Join a forum from the directory
Remove this room from the forums directory
This action is irreversible.\nAre you sure you want to remove this room from the forums directory?
The externals are not allowed to join this room
The externals are allowed to join this room
Allow the externals to join this room
This action is irreversible.\nAre you sure you want to allow the externals to join this room?

resources.string: This room is not accessible by link
This room is accessible by link
Enable the room access by link
Users will be allowed to join the room from a link
Users can join the room from the following link:
Users can join the room from the following link (an invite is still required for externals):
This change is currently forbidden when externals are allowed to join the room
This change is currently forbidden when the room is accessible by link
The validity period of your account has expired. An email has been sent to you in order to renew it. Once you’ve followed the link it contains, click below.
I renewed the validity of my account
A new email has been sent to you in order to renew your account validity. Once you’ve followed the link it contains, click below.
Your account has been renewed with success
For security reasons, Tchap is not supported anymore on Android 4.4.4 and lower

Please log out your account from this device.\nIn order to be able to decrypt your chat history when you will log in from another device, we invite you to export your encryption keys before signing out.
Your password must include a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol and be at a minimum 8 characters in length.

Your email domain is not registered on Tchap. If you have received an invite, you will be able to create a Tchap account, which will allow you to join only the private discussions in which you are invited.
An e-mail has been sent, except if an account already exists:
Please open it and click in the link it contains to create your account
I have not received any e-mail!
This password is too weak. It must include a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol and be at a minimum 8 characters in length.
This password was found in a dictionary, and is not acceptable
It looks like you’re trying to connect with another account. Do you want to sign out?
The email has been validated. You may pursue the related operation.
The email validation failed. The link has expired, or it is not valid.
Your new password must include a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol and be at a minimum 8 characters in length.
For security, logging out will delete any end-to-end encryption keys making previous encrypted chat history unreadable if you log back in.\nSelect export to backup them before signing out.
